CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 20, 1958, pg. 11, reads: "Grand Opening at Renee's - Shown are members of the faculty of Renee's Dance Studio at their grand opening last Sunday in beautiful Terrace Room of the Terrace Hall Hotel, 2337 Centre Ave. Left to right: Lillian Allen, instructor in charm and modeling; Jacqueline Lewis, ballerina, who will teach toe and ballet; Renee Young, proprietor and instructor in charm and modeling; Gladys Beverly, receptionist, and William (Bill) Stoker, instructor in acrobatics.  Guests at the grand opening were treated to food and refreshment, plus a floor show, featuring Lois (Shorts) Davis, Rudolph Moses, Sara Burney and others.  The management received a bevy of greeting via telegrams and flowers.  For information, call ATlantic 1-1171 or MAyflower 1-8870. - Harris Photo. - Adv."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Lillian Allen holding "Calypso Holiday" record album, Jacqueline "Jackie" Lewis [Jacqui Thompson], Florence Wright [Renee Young], Gladys Beverly and William Stoker, posed in Terrace Room of Terrace Hall Hotel at 2337 Centre Avenue, for opening of Renee's Dance Studio
